name: Standing Bent-Over One-Arm Dumbbell Triceps Extension
instructions: In a standing position, hold a dumbbell in one hand and keep your elbow close to your side.
Extend your arm backwards, keeping it close to your body and without moving the elbow. Hold the position for 1-2 seconds.
Slowly return to the starting position.
Repeat for the recommended number of repetitions.
Switch arms and repeat the exercise.
